title: How to Make Green Tea Chocolate / Matcha Nama Chocolate (Recipe) 抹茶生チョコレートの作り方（レシピ）
description:
How to Make Green Tea Chocolate (Matcha Nama Chocolate) (抹茶生チョコレートの作り方) 

Irresistible white chocolate infused and dusted with Japanese green tea powder.  This rich decadent truffle simply melts in your mouth.

For the complete recipe with step-by-step pictures :: http://justonecookbook.com/recipes/green-tea-chocolate/

Ingredients:

400 g (14 oz) white chocolate (I used 4 Lindt White Chocolate Swiss Classic Bars)
125 ml (1/2 cup) heavy (whipping) cream
25 g (2 Tbsp.) unsalted butter
2 Tbsp. + 2 tsp. green tea powder (matcha)
8" x 8" (20 x 20 cm) baking dish lined with parchment paper


Music Courtesy of YouTube: "Keith"
